summary: This is an email forwarded by Mark L. Epstein on August 9, 2020, containing a threatening message from Anthony Pompliano. The sender claims to be an IRGC informant, demands $10,000, and alleges that Donald Trump had sex with an underage girl on Jeffrey Epstein's island, threatening to expose this information.

keyFacts: Anthony Pompliano claims to be an IRGC (Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps) informant and threatens Mark L. Epstein.
The email demands $10,000 from Mark L. Epstein to stop contact.
It alleges that Donald Trump had sex with an underage girl on Jeffrey Epstein's island.
The sender claims Trump assassinated an IRGC commander and that the IRGC hates him, suggesting they could expose Trump through Mark Epstein.
The email is forwarded by Mark L. Epstein on August 9, 2020.
